snippet: The newspaper said the cartoon had been misunderstood, but the president of the Palestinian Authority has ordered an investigation.
abstract: Palestinian Authority Pres Mahmoud Abbas orders probe of Palestinian newspaper Al-Hayat al-Jadida for publishing cartoon some readers said was Prophet Muhammad.

byline.original: By SAID GHAZALI and ISABEL KERSHNER

lead_paragraph: The newspaper said the cartoon had been misunderstood, but the president of the Palestinian Authority has ordered an investigation.

headline.main: Palestinian Newspaper Accused of Running Muhammad Cartoon
headline.print_headline: Palestinian Paper Accused of Using Cartoon of Prophet
